page.title: 13TOURIST QUESTIONNAIRE 2
page.content: {This page continues from the previous {one)} The visitors also had some areas which they thought could be improved. They did not like the lack of car parks, the toilets and the double yellow lines. They pointed out that it was very hard to find convenient places to park for shopping and the beach, especially if the Den car park was full. A few complained about the beach saying it was "stony", "covered in seaweed", "too much dogs mess". Some of the younger people felt that there was not enough entertainment for the evenings. The figures show, however, that for more than nine people out of ten Teignmouth provides very strong attractions; enough to make them choose to return more than once to spend their holidays here.
